description: This file defines a FirecrawlReader class that extends a base Reader class to perform web scraping and crawling using the Firecrawl API. It includes methods for synchronous and asynchronous operations, handling content extraction, and chunking of documents.

classes.name: FirecrawlReader
classes.description: A class that provides methods to scrape and crawl websites using the Firecrawl API, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations, with configurable modes and chunking.

methods.name: scrape
methods.description: Scrapes a website URL and returns a list of Document objects containing the content.

methods.name: async_scrape
methods.description: Asynchronously scrapes a website URL and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: crawl
methods.description: Crawls a website URL and returns a list of Document objects with the content.

methods.name: async_crawl
methods.description: Asynchronously crawls a website URL and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Reads from a URL based on the mode ('scrape' or 'crawl') and returns a list of Document objects.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronously reads from a URL based on the mode ('scrape' or 'crawl') and returns a list of Document objects.
